title: 1911 S74 Silks Christy Mathewson SGC 2.5 Turkey Red
author: martyesullivan

posts.post_title: 1911 S74 Silks Christy Mathewson SGC 2.5 Turkey Red
posts.post_content: I have a nice S74 of Mathewson that I need to part with in order to get something that fits better into my collection.  I'd like to get $1,000 for it.  If you're interested, email me at [url]martyesullivan@yahoo.com[/url]
I'm willing to listen to offers if anyone has interest.  I'll list it on eBay this weekend if it doesn't sell here.

I listed this on eBay last night for $775.  Within the first hour of it being up, I received an offer for $550.  I haven't accepted the offer yet.  I'll accept the highest offer that I get at 5pm CST today.  If you're interested, send an offer, you might get lucky.

My eBay user ID is martyesullivan

Let me know if you see anything else you could use.  

Thanks,
Marty S.
